description.japanese: ビルドモードで少なくとも5つのアイテムを使って家を飾る
description.koreana: 건설 모드에서 5개 이상의 아이템으로 집 장식하기
description.latam: Decora tu casa con al menos 5 objetos en modo Construcción
description.schinese: 在建造模式使用至少 5 件物品装饰住宅
description.spanish: Decora tu casa con al menos 5 objetos en el Modo construcción.
description.tchinese: 在建造模式中，使用至少 5 件物品裝飾你的房屋

description.brazilian: Pague para atualizar as missões no Quadro de Contratos da Prata.
description.english: Pay to refresh the available Contract Missions on Dime's Contract Board
description.french: Payer pour actualiser les missions disponibles sur le tableau des contrats de Zinc
description.german: Bezahle, um die verfügbaren Auftragsmissionen auf Dimes Auftragstafel zu aktualisieren.
description.italian: Paga per aggiornare i contratti disponibili sulla bacheca di Zecchina.
description.japanese: ダイムの指名手配表で利用可能な契約ミッションをリフレッシュするために支払う
description.koreana: 비용을 지불하고 다임의 계약 게시판에 올라온 계약 임무 새로고침하기
description.latam: Paga para actualizar las misiones de contrato en el tablero de contratos de Neda
description.schinese: 在黛姆的委托公告板上花费资源刷新可用委托任务
description.spanish: Paga para renovar las misiones de contrato del tablón de contratos de Saca.
description.tchinese: 花錢刷新一角的契約板上的契約任務

description.brazilian: Capture um Ticobot lendário.
description.english: Catch a Legendary Bitibot
description.french: Attraper un Minibot légendaire
description.german: Fange einen legendären Bitibot.
description.italian: Cattura un Bitibot leggendario.
description.japanese: レジェンドタイプのビティボットを捕まえる
description.latam: Atrapa a un bitibot legendario
description.schinese: 抓住一台传说庇陆宝
description.spanish: Atrapa un bitibot legendario.
description.tchinese: 抓捕一個傳奇迷你機

description.brazilian: Capture um Aquabot lendário.
description.english: Catch a Legendary Gillibot
description.french: Attraper un Branchibot légendaire
description.german: Fange einen legendären Gillibot.
description.italian: Cattura un Gillibot leggendario.
description.japanese: レジェンドタイプのジリボットを捕まえる
description.latam: Atrapa a un gillibot legendario
description.schinese: 抓住一台传说灵水宝
description.spanish: Atrapa un robopez legendario.
description.tchinese: 抓捕一個傳奇水下機

displayName.japanese: ボットストン ティーA パーティー

description.brazilian: Jogue CH-4 na água.
description.english: Throw T-3A in the water
description.french: Lancer T-H3 dans l'eau
description.german: Wirf T-3A ins Wasser.
description.italian: Hai gettato T-3 in acqua.
description.japanese: ティーAを水の中に投げ入れる
description.latam: Tira a T3 al agua.
description.schinese: 将荼-叶丢入水中
description.spanish: Has lanzado a T3 al agua.
description.tchinese: 把茶丟進水中

description.brazilian: Congele um Aquabot.
description.english: Find a way to freeze a Gillibot
description.french: Trouver un moyen de geler un Branchibot
description.german: Finde einen Weg, einen Gillibot einzufrieren.
description.italian: Trova il modo di congelare un Gillibot.
description.japanese: ジリボットを凍らせる方法を見つける
description.latam: Encuentra la forma de congelar un gillibot
description.schinese: 想办法冻结一台灵水宝
description.spanish: Encuentra el modo de congelar un robopez.
description.tchinese: 想辦法把水下機冰凍住

description.brazilian: Resgate todos os Unibots.
description.english: Rescue all of the Unibots
description.french: Sauver tous les Unibots
description.german: Rette alle Unibots.
description.italian: Salva tutti gli Unibot.
description.japanese: すべてののユニボットを救出する
description.latam: Rescata a todos los unibots
description.schinese: 解救所有联合机器人
description.spanish: Rescata a todos los unibots.
description.tchinese: 解救所有和睦機

description.brazilian: Compre todos os mods de arma na Forja do Ferraz.
description.english: Purchase every Weapon Mod from Smithy's Master Forge
description.french: Acheter tous les modules d'armes dans la grande forge de Ferro
description.german: Erwirb alle Waffen-Mods in Smithys Meisterschmiede.
description.italian: Acquista tutte le modifiche per armi alla forgia di Faber.
description.japanese: スミシーの達人の鍛冶場からすべての武器モッドを購入する
description.koreana: 스미디의 마스터의 대장간에서 모든 무기 부착물 구매하기

description.schinese: 从老锻的大师锻炉处购买全部武器模组
description.spanish: Compra todas las modificaciones de arma de la forja maestra de Herrero.
description.tchinese: 從鐵匠的至尊熔爐購買所有武器模組

description.tchinese: 製作並穿上黃金迷你機面具
